data.title: Learn More About The Team
data.meta_description: Learn more about us! We are the team behind outsourcing your accounting and bookkeeping using WVC RubixCloud. We are trained professionals here for you!
data.text:
WVC RubixCloud is a leading provider of outsourced accounting. Backed by the power of a leading-edge accounting firm, William Vaughan Company, WVC RubixCloud offers a full package of services beyond traditional accounting. Since 2014, WVC RubixCloud has been helping businesses gain a clear and accurate financial picture by streamlining the day-to-day accounting functions through hands-on expertise. By leveraging advanced technology, WVC RubixCloud manages everything from accounts payable to accounts receivable, and everything in between. With real-time data accessible anywhere, business owners can now make better business decisions without the headache of the typical accounting and finance operations.

Nicole Menden has been the organization since its inception in 2014. She leads the operations team ensuring clients receive the highest level of quality and professionalism. Nicole’s past WVC RubixCloud role serving as an Account Manager has provided her with the advantage of knowing every process, every step of the way. She is highly skilled with employee relations and helping managers understand what needs to happen in order to increase performance. Nicole has a keen ability to listen to challenges and solve problems at all organizational levels. Building personal relationships with her employees and clients and being able to watch them grow and succeed is the most rewarding part of the job for Nicole.

Kristin Metzger, CPA serves as the Restaurant & Hospitality Practice Leader for WVC RubixCloud’s affiliate firm, William Vaughan Company. Leveraging her more than 15 years of experience working closely with restaurateurs and hoteliers, Kristin consults with clients on a variety of matters including minimizing tax liability and establishing financial reporting methods that will provide a clear picture of business expenses and assets. In addition, she listens to current and prospective clients to identify specific pain points and then works with the implementation team to design and apply specific workflows to meet those needs. Kristin is known for developing deep client relationships through frequent interaction and open communication.
